title: Don’t Hold Back!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Alright, I’ll fight with this gear.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Okay. Maybe we can defeat it this time......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>We have my loadout. Have some confidence! Okay, it’s starting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Uhh..... like this. Whoa, the hit landed! Awesome! And then this..... Yay! Just a little more! ......We did it! We defeated it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah! Now we have new resources!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yup! We can make even stronger weapons now. Thanks for the help, Mia-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hehe, if you run into any more problems in the future, just let me know. I’m good at this game.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Thank you! Ruby will be relying on you then. How can Ruby repay you...... Maybe with Aqours’s special training methods?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Um, uh, don’t worry about it. Kanan comes up with the practice routines for Aqours, right? I heard about them from Kasumi......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>That’s right! Kanan-chan trains us hard, but Ruby thinks we definitely benefit from her routines.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Ummm, then, maybe next time...... Ahaha......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
